name: Polygon Playbox
description:
Did you ever wanted to make simple physics simulations? Polygon Playbox is a tool that is aimed at doing just that!
The underlying physics engine is a very basic one written by me :)
I recommend turning on full screen for this one

Controls are straightforward and explained in the program
Left click - To select and change the features of the polygon
Right click - To open up the UI for adding polygons
Mouse wheel - Panning/Zooming

For making a polygon static, set its mass to 0

Game Engine - olc::PixelGameEngine
Splash Screen - olcPGEX_SplashScreen
